summary: A nomad mercenary on a high-tech motorcycle helps bring about the downfall of the evil Orwellian government, the Omega.
cast: Robert Ginty|Persis Khambatta|Donald Pleasence|Fred Williamson|Harrison Muller Sr.|Philip Dallas|Laura Nucci|Vinicio Ricchi|Geretta Geretta|Consuelo Marcaccini|Daniel Stephen|Stefano Mior|Scott Coffey|Goffredo Marcaccini|Urs Althaus|Lucien Bruchon|Harrison Muller|Nguyen Huu Phu|Giuliano Rosati|Ennio Antonelli|Russel Case|Hernani Moreira|Samuele Goldzader|Massimo Liti|Einstein|Elettra Baldassarri|Bruno Bilotta|Neal Gold|Jurgen Morhofer|Mario Pedone
keywords: psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|professor|motorcycle|city
title: El guerrero del mundo perdido (Warrior of the lost world) (1983)
